name: Beatpoints
description: Spotify player donde un grupo de puntos reaccionan al ritmo de las canciones en un entorno 3d.

name: The Adventures of The Black Hawk
description: A graphic adventure of the 90s, thirty years later. Full of humor, irony, calamities and a lot, a lot of intrigue.

name: Argentina 8-bit
description: Argentine culture app with retro aesthetics that uses the latest interactive technologies: AR, VR, and virtual chat with voice use.
